about_the_game:
Level Up is a dynamic 2D side-scrolling adventure that merges the fun of an 90s side scroller video game with the vibes of a hip-hop album. Created by a multifaceted first time developer — a two-time Ninja Warrior, Nerdcore Rapper, and an Operational Excellence leader — this game is a unique way to experience the hip hop album Level Up featuring the talented artists Substantial, Mega Ran, Kadesh Flow, Mc Ohm-I, and Oso Cinco, with masterful audio engineering by K-Murdock. Brought to life by a successful Kickstarter campaign Level Up promises to bring a new frontier to music experience.






In Level Up, you will traverse through classic 16-bit landscapes where each level unfolds in sync with the tracks from a lyrically masterful album. It's not just about reaching the end, it's about flowing with the beat, becoming one with the music and experiencing music in a new way.






Unlock songs and get access to game only versions of the album as you progress. Each level introduces a new track, with lyrics that narratively tie into the game’s journey, enhancing the experience and connection between the gameplay and the music.






Whether you're in it for the story, the beats, or the challenge, the game meets you where you want by offering:
  • Story Mode: Play through the album side by side with lyrical mastery.
  • Freestyle Mode: Play and vibe out to the instrumentals only.
  • Challenge Mode: Increase the difficulty with stronger enemies and tougher boss battles.






Play through a visually engaging 2D world designed to reflect the ethos of underground hip-hop culture and witness the story unfold through lyrical content.
Want to just listen in? Use the in game music player to listen to your favorite tracks. You’ll also receive a copy of the album included with your game download.

DLC: Explore special content including:
  • Track breakdowns with the game creator
  • Insights into the production of both the game and the album through unreleased playtest videos
  • B-Side versions of the album
  • Unreleased songs created for the game but never used!






Level Up is more than just a game or an album, it’s a multimedia experience that invites players into the heart of hip-hop culture. Share your scores, favorite tracks, and experiences with a vibrant community of gamers and music lovers.
Join us on Steam and be a part of the journey to the top.






As a solo developer with a background in high-level athletics and music, the creator of Level Up brings a unique perspective to game development, ensuring that every element of the game resonates with authenticity and high energy. Get ready to Level Up your game, beat by beat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Memory: 512 GB RAM
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 380 MB available space

reviews:
“The extra layer of rhythmic interactivity the music offers enlivens an age-old formula, and given the seamless way each track links in with the overall theme, I was surprised people haven't tried this more often.”
Debug Magazine
short_description: The one of a kind 2D side-scrolling adventure that combines action-packed gameplay with a hip-hop album. Created by a 2 time Ninja Warrior and Nerdcore Rapper Creative Mind Frame get ready to immerse yourselves in a lyrical hip hop journey through an immersive 16-bit experience.
